segments.text: I want to get on the bus already .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It just isn't on time today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was supposed to be here thirty minutes ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it'll be here pretty soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to get to work , so it better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really do hate public transportation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree , it's just never on time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I also hate having to stand at a bus stop in all kinds of weather .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We need to get a car .
segments.speaker: S1
